title: More peaches - #3 Bellini Cocktail
method: Store in fridge for thirty minutes until chilled.
1/4 cup (20ml) peach puree into flute glass, gently pour in sparkling wine so as not to overflow.
Stir gently top up glass, garnish with a peach slice.
Substitute wine for soda water or non alcholic sparkling wine.
testimonials: Best way to eat them!  Straight from your tree or fruit bowl!
